<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Sticky Bomb](/Feats.aspx?ID=5786) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Additive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=795" />
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 67 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

You can mix in a sticky additive to an [alchemical bomb](/Weapons.aspx?ID=431) to make its contents adhere and continue to deal damage. A creature hit by a sticky bomb also takes [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to and of the same type as the bomb's splash damage. If the bomb already deals persistent damage, combine the two amounts.
name: Sticky Bomb
